replyMsg:
**Don't Ask to Ask, Just Ask.**
When you ask to ask a question, you're wasting time.
People aren't likely to help you, as they're unable to tell how complex your issue is without becoming involved.
Next time, please post what your issue is directly with as much information as you can.
Passerbys are most likely to help you if they can see all the information they need all at once.
Visit <https://dontasktoask.com/> for a better explanation.
description: Don't Ask to Ask, Just Ask
